meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6FN Conference Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: SPECIAL RECOGNITION
agenda_items.description: Special recognition of Sergio Pena and Adalberto Rodriguez for their years of service and dedication to the City and Park and Recreation Department.

agenda_items.title: Trinity Forest Spine Trail
agenda_items.description: Authorize Amendment #1 to the Project Specific Agreement with Dallas County for funding for the Trinity Forest Spine Trail Phase 2.

agenda_items.title: Trinity Forest Spine Trail Correction
agenda_items.description: Authorize a correction to Resolution No. 21-1020 regarding funding for the Trinity Spine Trail.

agenda_items.title: Land Acquisition
agenda_items.description: Authorize acquisition from Dallas Independent School District of approximately 360,143 square feet of residential unimproved land for development as a community park.

agenda_items.title: Glencoe Park Site Approval
agenda_items.description: Authorize a site approval for the installation of Four Chromatic Gates art piece at Glencoe Park.

agenda_items.title: Juanita J. Craft Park
agenda_items.description: Authorize a construction services contract for installation of playground equipment and Independent Safety Audit.

financial_items.description: Funding for Trinity Forest Spine Trail Phase 2 from Dallas County.
Correction to funding for Trinity Spine Trail.
Acquisition of land for community park.
Construction services contract for playground equipment.
